transcript.text: Hey, Jacob.
Hello.
How are you? Doing good and you?
I'm alright.
Had a good time up?
Yeah, did.
I was back walking in Patagonia.
That's amazing. That's so cool. Yeah, it was really fun.
But now I'm like, we got rained on the last few days, so I'm a little sick now.
Yeah, it's probably brutal. Yeah.

So what we discussed last week... the biggest thing was the warmer outbound playbook... leveraging existing user base for product-driven campaigns to reengage/upsell/upgrade/activate... need sales to weigh in... data work from warehouse to Salesforce and then to Unify.
And these are for current customers or like?

This is for current users... anyone who has created a user on WorkOS... expansion angles... user management threshold should be in Salesforce... engage accounts close to threshold with sequences... need to map playbooks with sales and operationalize in Apollo or Unify.
Heads up: as you grow, building a master account/TAM table becomes critical to orchestrate across paid ads, Unify, Gong, etc., do entity resolution, and coordinate engagement across platforms.
That makes sense. We've been talking about that a lot... better system for orchestrating account data across systems.
I kind of wanted to work on signals... persona change/new hires in Salesforce... need a bigger list beyond P0/P1/P2... need system for porting new leads into Salesforce and alerts on companies...
So you have lists in a spreadsheet of top AI companies to monitor from website visitors, new hires, and other signals.
Yes... rather than constantly re-enriching... sales should be alerted when one of the 500 is on our website.
We could create a custom object for signals (new hire, job posting, etc.) and keep a timeline at the account level. Website visitors are trickier due to volume; might need aggregation.
Can it be pushed to Slack too?
Yep.

First piece: align on source-of-truth field for target accounts, push spreadsheet into Salesforce, create missing accounts, label them; then monitor signals (new hire/job posting) and push back as custom objects. Website visit signal needs research (Snitcher/Cargo/Unify).
I don't think assigning 500 accounts to one person is going to get us what we want. That's too much.
We can add traffic signals via SEMrush in Clay. Getting started with a master target account table helps; list exists but is stale; we should create a dedicated Salesforce field instead of notes.
We can do it in Cargo. We already have some signals set up in Cargo, so you can just add to those.

Next steps: combine all flags, curate list, pull domains, build master target account list, set up signal monitoring, push signals back into Salesforce as a custom object; decide rep assignment; research website visitor signal implementation.
Koala had trending (low/medium/high). I just want to get that out somewhere.
We can likely figure this out with Unify/Cargo; define thresholds (e.g., visitors/sessions/page views) and send to Slack. For prospects you won't have emails; for users you will.
Okay, I actually have to run.
We have next steps for the target accounting project; Jacobia will be in touch and then we'll get started with the different layers.

default_summary.markdown_formatted:
to re-engage/expand existing WorkOS user base (usage thresholds, expansion angles), pending Sales prioritization.
- Discussed building a master target-account / TAM table to orchestrate GTM engagement across systems.
- Kathleen requested scaling signals beyond P0/P1/P2: importing/labeling a broader target list into Salesforce, and pushing signals (new hires, job postings, website intent) into Salesforce + Slack.

## Decisions
- Use Cargo as the primary place to extend existing signal setups.

## Next Steps
- Curate/merge existing target account flags and create a dedicated Salesforce field for

.
- Push curated list into Salesforce (create missing accounts, avoid duplicates).
- Create a Salesforce custom object for signals with an account-level timeline.
- Research best approach for website visitor intent (Snitcher/Cargo vs Unify → Salesforce) and define aggregation thresholds.

action_items.description: Compile and curate all existing target-account flags (P0/P1/P2, evangelist tag, note-field targets, spreadsheets) into a single list.
Create a dedicated Salesforce field for Target Accounts and import/label curated target accounts (creating missing accounts, avoiding duplicates).
Design and implement a Salesforce custom object for account-level signals (new hire, job posting, website intent) and send notifications to Slack.
Research website visitor intent source + aggregation thresholds (Snitcher/Cargo vs Unify → Salesforce) and propose an MVP implementation.
